title: Glen & Tyler's Paris Double-cross
description: Glen and Tyler are young, in love, and the wealthiest human beings on the planet. But when Glen's brother calls from a jail in Paris, they're off to France to tangle with spies, neo-Nazis, evil world-spanning conspiracies and French gangsters. Plus they have a romantic dinner, and find long-lost treasure. Really, itâ€™s a fun-filled non-stop romp.
author: J.B. Sanders
